attributes.action: Commision independent research into 5G safety. Stop 5G untill completed.
attributes.additional_details: Due to amount of concerns with regards to safety of 5G, we want the Government to ban 5G untill intependent research is commisioned and completed. Alternatively we would like to be able to vote and decide if we want to have 5G, as you are forcing it on us and give no choice to individuals living in areas affected.
attributes.background: There are concerns that 5G does cause harm to individuals in areas it has been introduced in already. We call to the Government to commision independent research into 5G safety. Meantime, we call for the Government to ban 5G in the UK untill results from research are received.
